00016 #ifndef __CPROPERTIES_H
00017 #define __CPROPERTIES_H
00018 
00019 #include "simkerneldefs.h"
00020 #include "globals.h"
00021 #include "cobject.h"
00022 #include <vector>
00023 
00024 NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00025 
00026 class cProperty;
00027 
00028 
00034 class SIM_API cProperties : public cObject
00035 {
00036   protected:
00037     bool islocked;
00038     int refcount;
00039     std::vector<cProperty *> propv;
00040 
00041   public:
00042     // internal: locks the object and all contained properties against modifications.
00043     // The object cannot be unlocked -- one must copy contents to an unlocked
00044     // object, or call dup() (new objects are created in unlocked state).
00045     virtual void lock();
00046 
00047     // internal: increment/decrement reference count
00048     int addRef()  {return ++refcount;}
00049     int removeRef()  {return --refcount;}
00050 
00051   public:
00057     explicit cProperties();
00058 
00062     cProperties(const cProperties& other) {refcount=0; islocked=false; operator=(other);}
00063 
00067     virtual ~cProperties();
00068 
00072     cProperties& operator=(const cProperties& other);
00074 
00080     virtual cProperties *dup() const  {return new cProperties(*this);}
00081 
00085     virtual const char *getName() const  {return "properties";}
00086 
00090     virtual std::string info() const;
00091 
00095     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00096 
00100     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00102 
00108     virtual int getNumProperties() const  {return propv.size();}
00109 
00115     virtual const std::vector<const char *> getNames() const;
00116 
00120     virtual cProperty *get(int k) const;
00121 
00128     virtual cProperty *get(const char *name, const char *index=NULL) const;
00129 
00141     virtual bool getAsBool(const char *name, const char *index=NULL) const;
00142 
00149     virtual std::vector<const char *> getIndicesFor(const char *name) const;
00150 
00154     virtual void add(cProperty *p);
00155 
00159     virtual void remove(int k);
00161 };
00162 
00163 NAMESPACE_END
